attributes.action: Remove the whole or first name from the epaulettes of Police Officers in Cambridgshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Police in Cambridgshire now have to wear their first and surnames stitched into their epaulettes. 

There is no mention of "P.C. Bloggs" , officers names are displayed just as plain "Joe Bloggs"
This not only belittles officers but puts them, and their families in danger. Don't let an officer be hunted down and harmed before this rule is overturned.
